input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: Eating citrus has a direct effect on vitmain C. Vitmain C has a direct effect on curly hair. For patients not consuming citrus, the probability of curly hair is 49%. For patients consuming citrus, the probability of curly hair is 38%. For patients consuming citrus, would it be less likely to see curly hair if the patient had not consumed citrus?
